name: Matt Brunt ✨ (@brunty@brunty.social)
summary:
Attached: 1 image

I was just in the middle of typing something and #Windows11 popped up a box about restarting for updates that stole focus. I was typing and pressing space clicked the button to restart so now I’m sat waiting for it to finish as it interrupted what I’m doing 

Piece of shit operating system

#Microsoft #Windows #Fail #ShittyUX
